description:
Are the vessels of Heroic Blood destined to fight one another and die?
Friend and foe alike are slain by the end of a bloody battle. All they leave behind are the blood crystals that serve as their grave markers...
However, the survivors must continue to fight for the fate of the world.
Though his plan was stopped once, Grumman throws Chiyu into the ring to forcibly open gates to other worlds.
Caught between her father Grumman and Chihiro, Yuri is distraught, and she brings about another tragedy.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kayowaki Hana no Tsubomi ni wa, Kusuri mo Areba Doku mo Aru.
Les frêles fleurs en bourgeon peuvent être un remède comme un poison
The Delicate Flower Bud Is Both Medicine and Poison
か弱き花の蕾には, 薬もあれば毒もある.
